subs.text: Today's song: Sisters are Doing it for Themselves.

The problem with the Supreme Court decision is that while the Constitution doesnâ€™t specifically name abortion as a right, in order to implement a ban on abortion a state will have to violate all kinds of other rights that are specifically mentioned in the US Constitution and probably the state constitution as well.
New version of the reallySimple package adds a reader section to the returned object. The feeder app has been updated.
